Data Fields
eint_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » External Interrupts (EINT)

External Interrupt Attribute Data Structure. More...

#include <eint.h>

Detailed Description

This data structure is used for controlling external interrupt IO peripherals.

Data Fields

u8 pin_assign
 The Pin assignment to use (see LPC17XXDEV)
 
u8 value
 Value of input at pin (1 for high and zero for low)
 
u8 mode
 Pin mode for pulling up/down/float.
